infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Aura Gold requires camera access for real-time facial biometric analysis.
infoPlist.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: Aura Gold uses Face ID to securely authenticate staff and protect patient PHI.

plugins.cameraPermission: Aura Gold requires camera access for biometric analysis.

plugins.faceIDPermission: Allow Aura Gold to use Face ID to protect data.
